snippet: The public editor plans to listen and respond to readers in a new way, holding office hours Monday and Tuesday, on Twitter, at @sulliview and at the #OpenPublic hashtag.
abstract: The public editor plans to listen and respond to readers in a new way, holding office hours Monday and Tuesday, on Twitter, at @sulliview and at the #OpenPublic hashtag.

headline.main: An Experiment by the Public Editor on Twitter
